SEARCH
Package com.app.repository

Interface PlayersWithStatisticsRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
PlayersWithStatisticsRepositoryImpl
public interface PlayersWithStatisticsRepository
Repository interface for managing PlayerWithStatistic entities. This interface provides methods to retrieve player statistics and determine top-performing players.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<PlayerWithStatistic>
    findPlayersWithStatistics()
    Retrieves the statistics for all players.
    List<PlayerWithStatistic>
    findPlayerWithStatistic(Long id)
    Retrieves the statistics for a specific player identified by their ID.
    List<PlayerWithStatistic>
    getTheBestPlayer()
    Retrieves the best-performing player based on their statistics.
    List<PlayerWithStatistic>
    getTheBestPlayerInPeriod(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
    Retrieves the best-performing player(s) within a specified time period.

  • Method Details

    • findPlayerWithStatistic

      List<PlayerWithStatistic> findPlayerWithStatistic(Long id)
      Retrieves the statistics for a specific player identified by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the player whose statistics are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a List of PlayerWithStatistic objects containing the player's statistics

    • findPlayersWithStatistics

      List<PlayerWithStatistic> findPlayersWithStatistics()
      Retrieves the statistics for all players.
      Returns:
      a List of PlayerWithStatistic objects for all players

    • getTheBestPlayer

      List<PlayerWithStatistic> getTheBestPlayer()
      Retrieves the best-performing player based on their statistics.
      Returns:
      a List of PlayerWithStatistic objects for the best player(s)

    • getTheBestPlayerInPeriod

      List<PlayerWithStatistic> getTheBestPlayerInPeriod(LocalDateTime from, LocalDateTime to)
      Retrieves the best-performing player(s) within a specified time period.
      Parameters:
      from - the start date and time of the period
      to - the end date and time of the period
      Returns:
      a List of PlayerWithStatistic objects for the best player(s) in the given period
